Package ohos.data.distributed.common

Interface KvStore

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DeviceKvStore, SingleKvStore

    public interface KvStore
    Represents a key-value distributed database and provides methods for adding, deleting, modifying, querying, and subscribing to distributed data.

    You can create distributed databases of different types by KvManager#getKvStore with input parameter Options. Distributed database types are defined in KvStoreType, including SingleKvStore, and DeviceKvStore.

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Data#DATA_DISTRIBUTEDDATAMGR

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void commit​()
      Submits a transaction operation in the KvStore database.
      void delete​(String key)
      Deletes the key-value pair based on a specified key.
      void deleteBatch​(List<String> keys)
      Deletes key-value pairs in batches from the KvStore database.
      void enableSync​(boolean enabled)
      Sets whether to enable synchronization.
      String getStoreId​()
      Obtains the store ID of the current KvStore database instance.

      Inserts key-value pairs into the KvStore database in batches.
      void putBoolean​(String key, boolean value)
      Writes a key-value pair of the boolean type into the KvStore database.
      void putByteArray​(String key, byte[] value)
      Writes a key-value pair of the byte array type into the KvStore database.

      Writes a key-value pair of the double type into the KvStore database.

      Writes a key-value pair of the float type into the KvStore database.

      Writes a key-value pair of the int type into the KvStore database.

      Writes a key-value pair of the string type into the KvStore database.
      void rollback​()
      Rolls back a transaction operation in the KvStore database.
      void setSyncRange​(List<String> localLabels, List<String> remoteSupportLabels)
      Sets synchronization range labels.
      void startTransaction​()
      Starts a transaction operation in the KvStore database.
      void subscribe​(SubscribeType subscribeType, KvStoreObserver observer)
      Registers a KvStoreObserver for the database.
      void unSubscribe​(KvStoreObserver observer)
      Unsubscribes from the KvStore database based on the specified subscribeType and KvStoreObserver.

    • Method Detail

      • getStoreId

        String getStoreId​()
           throws KvStoreException
        Obtains the store ID of the current KvStore database instance.
        Returns:
        Returns the store ID.
        Throws:
        KvStoreException - Throws this exception if any of the following errors occurs: SERVER_UNAVAILABLE, IPC_ERROR, and DB_ERROR.
        Since:
        1

      • putBoolean

        void putBoolean​(String key,
                boolean value)
         throws KvStoreException
        Writes a key-value pair of the boolean type into the KvStore database.
        Parameters:
        key - Indicates the key. The length must be less than MAX_KEY_LENGTH. Spaces before and after the key will be cleared.
        value - Indicates the boolean value.
        Throws:
        KvStoreException - Throws this exception if any of the following errors occurs: SERVER_UNAVAILABLE, IPC_ERROR, and DB_ERROR.
        Since:
        1

      • putString

        void putString​(String key,
               String value)
        throws KvStoreException
        Writes a key-value pair of the string type into the KvStore database.

        If you do not want to synchronize this key-value pair to other devices, set the write option in the local database.

        Parameters:
        key - Indicates the key. The length must be less than MAX_KEY_LENGTH. Spaces before and after the key will be cleared.
        value - Indicates the string value, which must be less than 4 MB as a UTF-8 byte array.
        Throws:
        KvStoreException - Throws this exception if any of the following errors occurs: SERVER_UNAVAILABLE, IPC_ERROR, and DB_ERROR.
        Since:
        1

      • putByteArray

        void putByteArray​(String key,
                  byte[] value)
           throws KvStoreException
        Writes a key-value pair of the byte array type into the KvStore database.
        Parameters:
        key - Indicates the key. The length must be less than MAX_KEY_LENGTH. Spaces before and after the key will be cleared.
        value - Indicates the byte array, which must be less than 4 MB.
        Throws:
        KvStoreException - Throws this exception if any of the following errors occurs: SERVER_UNAVAILABLE, IPC_ERROR, and DB_ERROR.
        Since:
        1

      • delete

        void delete​(String key)
     throws KvStoreException
        Deletes the key-value pair based on a specified key.
        Parameters:
        key - Indicates the key. The length must be less than MAX_KEY_LENGTH. Spaces before and after the key will be cleared.
        Throws:
        KvStoreException - Throws this exception if any of the following errors occurs: SERVER_UNAVAILABLE, IPC_ERROR, DB_ERROR, and KEY_NOT_FOUND.
        Since:
        1

      • subscribe

        void subscribe​(SubscribeType subscribeType,
               KvStoreObserver observer)
        throws KvStoreException
        Registers a KvStoreObserver for the database. When data in the distributed database changes, the callback in KvStoreObserver will be invoked.
        Parameters:
        subscribeType - Indicates the subscription type, which is defined in SubscribeType.
        observer - Indicates the observer of data change events in the distributed database.
        Throws:
        KvStoreException - Throws this exception if any of the following errors occurs: SERVER_UNAVAILABLE, IPC_ERROR, DB_ERROR, and STORE_ALREADY_SUBSCRIBE.
        Since:
        1

      • unSubscribe

        void unSubscribe​(KvStoreObserver observer)
          throws KvStoreException
        Unsubscribes from the KvStore database based on the specified subscribeType and KvStoreObserver.
        Parameters:
        observer - Indicates the data change observer registered by #subscribe(SubscribeType, KvStoreObserver).
        Throws:
        KvStoreException - Throws this exception if any of the following errors occurs: SERVER_UNAVAILABLE, IPC_ERROR, DB_ERROR, and STORE_NOT_SUBSCRIBE.
        Since:
        1

      • putBatch

        void putBatch​(List<Entry> entries)
       throws KvStoreException
        Inserts key-value pairs into the KvStore database in batches.
        Parameters:
        entries - Indicates the key-value pairs to be inserted in batches.
        Throws:
        KvStoreException - Throws this exception if a database error occurs.
        Since:
        1

      • deleteBatch

        void deleteBatch​(List<String> keys)
          throws KvStoreException
        Deletes key-value pairs in batches from the KvStore database.
        Parameters:
        keys - Indicates the key-value pairs to be deleted in batches.
        Throws:
        KvStoreException - Throws this exception if a database error occurs.
        Since:
        1

      • startTransaction

        void startTransaction​()
               throws KvStoreException
        Starts a transaction operation in the KvStore database.

        After the database transaction is started, you can submit or roll back the operation.

        Throws:
        KvStoreException - Throws this exception if a database error occurs.
        Since:
        1

      • commit

        void commit​()
     throws KvStoreException
        Submits a transaction operation in the KvStore database.
        Throws:
        KvStoreException - Throws this exception if a database error occurs.
        Since:
        1

      • rollback

        void rollback​()
       throws KvStoreException
        Rolls back a transaction operation in the KvStore database.
        Throws:
        KvStoreException - Throws this exception if a database error occurs.
        Since:
        1

      • enableSync

        void enableSync​(boolean enabled)
         throws KvStoreException
        Sets whether to enable synchronization.
        Parameters:
        enabled - Specifies whether to enable synchronization. The value true means to enable synchronization, and false means the opposite.
        Throws:
        KvStoreException - Throws this exception if an internal service error occurs.
        Since:
        4

      • setSyncRange

        void setSyncRange​(List<String> localLabels,
                  List<String> remoteSupportLabels)
           throws KvStoreException
        Sets synchronization range labels.

        The labels determine the devices with which data will be synchronized.

        Parameters:
        localLabels - Indicates the synchronization labels of the local device.
        remoteSupportLabels - Indicates the labels of the devices with which data will be synchronized.
        Throws:
        KvStoreException - Throws this exception if an internal service error occurs.
        Since:
        4
